block.securitycraft.reinforced_exposed_c: 强化斑驳的切制铜台阶
强化斑驳的切制铜楼梯
block.securitycraft.reinforced_light_blu: 强化淡蓝色染色玻璃板
block.securitycraft.reinforced_light_gra: 强化淡灰色染色玻璃板
block.securitycraft.reinforced_lime_stai: 强化淡灰色染色玻璃板
block.securitycraft.reinforced_magenta_s: 强化品红色染色玻璃板
block.securitycraft.reinforced_oxidized_: 强化氧化的切制铜楼梯
block.securitycraft.reinforced_pink_stai: 强化粉红色染色玻璃板
block.securitycraft.reinforced_smooth_cr: 强化平滑水晶石英台阶
强化平滑水晶石英楼梯
block.securitycraft.reinforced_stripped_: 强化去皮深色橡木原木
block.securitycraft.reinforced_weathered: 强化锈蚀的切制铜台阶
强化锈蚀的切制铜楼梯
death.attack.securitycraft.electricity.p: %1$s 在于 %2$s 搏斗时触电身亡
death.attack.securitycraft.fakeWater.pla: %1$s 在于 %2$s 搏斗时掉进了有毒的水里...?
death.attack.securitycraft.incorrectPass: %1$s 在于 %2$s 搏斗时输入了错误的密码
death.attack.securitycraft.laser.player: %1$s 在于 %2$s 搏斗时被激光切割致死
gui.securitycraft:alarm.no_smart_module: 您需要安装智能模块才能控制报警器播放的声音。
gui.securitycraft:alarm.smart_module: 单击列表中的声音条目之一以选择报警器播放的声音。
gui.securitycraft:blockPocketManager.nee: 需要一个存储模块来实现方块领域的自动组装。
gui.securitycraft:blockReinforcer.title: 通用方块强化器
高亮世界上列出的区块
您需要安装智能模块才能让探测器仅检测特定的块类型！
gui.securitycraft:invScan.emit_redstone: 对找到的物品发出红石信号: %s
gui.securitycraft:keycard_reader.level_m: 此安全卡无法被当前读取器识别！
gui.securitycraft:keycard_reader.noSmart: 您需要安装智能模块来单独控制安全卡级别。
gui.securitycraft:keycard_reader.smartMo: 单独的安全卡等级控制已激活！
gui.securitycraft:laser.noSmartModule: 您需要一个智能模块来控制哪一侧发射激光。
gui.securitycraft:laser.smartModule: 单击下面的复选框以配置激光应在哪一侧处于活动状态。
gui.securitycraft:projector.range.descri: 投影仪将块投影到距自身多远的地方。
gui.securitycraft:protectedFurnace.name: 受保护的熔炉
gui.securitycraft:rift_stabilizer.module: 您需要安装智能模块来切换该裂缝稳定器可以检测到的传送类型。
gui.securitycraft:rift_stabilizer.toggle: 单击下面列表中的条目可切换对该特定传送类型的检测。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.customizableB: 可定制：您可以使用通用方块修改器和安全工艺添加的各种模块来定制该块的功能。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.explosiveBloc: 爆炸物：该方块能够远程引爆，并且可以使用地雷远程访问工具激活/停用。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.intro.2: 由 Geforce、bl4ckscor3、Redstone_Dubstep 和 ChainmailPickaxe 提供
gui.securitycraft:scManual.lockable: 可锁定：该块可以使用声波安全系统锁定。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.ownableBlock: 可拥有：该方块具有抗爆炸能力，并且只能由放置它的玩家使用通用方块移除器来破坏。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.passcodeProte: 密码保护：只有正确输入所有者设置的密码后才能使用此块。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.patreon.title: 我们的赞助人:
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.admin_: 如果通过配置文件启用管理工具，则只能通过管理员工具使用它。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.bucket: 假熔岩桶是在酿造台中合成的，方法是将任何治疗药水放入顶部槽，并在底部槽中放入最多三个熔岩桶。
假水桶是在酿造台中合成的，方法是将任何伤害药水放入顶部槽中，并在底部槽中放入最多三个水桶。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.keypad: 放置一个密码盘框架并用密码盘右键单击它。
放置一个桶并用密码盘右键单击它。
放置一个高炉并用密码盘右键单击它。
放置一个箱子并用密码盘右键单击它。
放置一个熔炉并用密码盘右键单击它。
放置一个烟熏炉并用密码盘右键单击它。
放置一个强化铁活板门并用密码盘右键单击它。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.reinfo: 如果本书中没有另外说明，任何强化方块都可以按如下方式制作。 放置原版等效物（例如强化石 -> 石头）并用通用方块强化器将其打破，或者右键单击通用方块强化器，将其放入插槽中并关闭 GUI。
由通用方块强化器中的普通水晶石英块制成。
如果本书中没有另外说明，任何强化方块都可以按如下方式制作。 放置原版等效物（例如强化石 -> 石头）并用通用方块强化器将其打破，或者右键单击通用方块强化器，将其放入插槽中并关闭 GUI。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.sc_man: 安全工艺指南只能通过创造模式或输入“/sc help”（不带引号）来获取。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.viewActivated: 视图激活：当处于破坏范围内时，可以通过将光标悬停在该块上来激活该块。
gui.securitycraft:srat.name: 哨兵远程访问工具
gui.securitycraft:trophy_system.moduleRe: 您需要安装一个智能模块来切换该系统可以发射的子弹类型。
gui.securitycraft:trophy_system.toggle: 单击下面列表中的条目可切换指定的发射子弹。
help.securitycraft.admin_tool.info: 手持该物品右击可显示在世界中被放置的安全工艺方块的信息，可以显示的信息包括：方块的所有者名称及其UUID、锁的密码、访问等级、被插入的模块。
help.securitycraft.alarm.info: 当报警器收到红石信号时，报警器将发出报警器音效并闪烁红色，此后每隔 2 秒间隔一次。 间隔可以在报警器选项中修改。
help.securitycraft.blacklist_module.info: 黑名单模块通常用于将特定玩家添加方块效果或者阻止他们使用方块的部分功能。
help.securitycraft.block_change_detector: 一种能够检测方块是否被放置或破坏的设备。(默认情况下是5个方块，可以用通用方块修改器进行更改)。右键单击将打开其界面，可以在其中看到检测到的方块列表，以及是否仅检测破坏或放置方块，或两者兼而有之。
help.securitycraft.block_mines.info: 方块地雷是伪装成不同方块的地雷。经过或挖掘会导致它爆炸。对于方块地雷的所有者来说，不会因为上述行为而导致爆炸。
用于控制一个只有所有者和白名单玩家才能进入的方块领域。打开GUI时，可以看到一系列规模，选择后会在方块领域管理器周围建造方块领域。确保管理器放在底层的外侧。方块领域是一个您选择规模大小的立方体。角落由强化錾制水晶石英块构成，角落之间的方块是由正确方向的强化水晶石英柱构成，地板/墙壁/天花板是由方块领域墙构成。结构完成后单击“启用”会激活所有添加的模块。有关更多信息，请查阅自定义GUI（使用通用方块修改器右键单击）。
help.securitycraft.block_pocket_wall.inf: 方块领域墙用于构建方块领域。 更多信息请参见方块领域管理器页面。
help.securitycraft.block_reinforcers.inf: 通用方块强化器可以强化许多原版方块，并把它们转变为安全工艺变体。右键单击打开通用方块强化器，并将原版方块放入顶部槽，然后关闭GUI。或者您也可以手持强化器左键已经放置好的方块来进行强化（创造模式不行）。如果想把强化方块转变回原版方块，请把强化方块放在底部槽（二级或以上的强化器才有此功能）。一级强化器有300耐久，二级强化器有2700耐久，三级强化器可以无限使用。
help.securitycraft.bouncing_betty.info: 弹跳贝蒂会发射到空中并造成接触时爆炸。
help.securitycraft.briefcase.info: 一种需要密码才能打开的物品储存容器，可存储12组物品。制作完成后，右键单击它以设置此后使用的 4 位密码。再次右键单击需要输入之前设置的密码。要删除公文包的密码或更改其所有者，请将其放入副手并右键单击，同时在主手上持有通用密钥变换器/通用所属玩家转换器。
help.securitycraft.bucket_f_lava.info: 假熔岩的行为与熔岩相同，只不过它会立即治愈你而不是伤害你。
help.securitycraft.bucket_f_water.info: 假水的行为与水相同，只不过接触时它会伤害你，比熔岩更痛。
help.securitycraft.cage_trap.info: 诱捕笼会在任何接触它的玩家周围产生一个“笼子”，除了所有者。
help.securitycraft.camera_monitor.info: 摄像头监视器是一个便携式物品，用于查看最多 30 个已绑定安全摄像头的实时反馈。手持摄像头监视器右键单击安防摄像头将其绑定，然后右键单击空气并在GUI中选择想查看的摄像头。通过手持摄像头监视器再次右键单击安防摄像头或打开摄像头监视器的 GUI 并单击相应的“X”按钮来取绑定安防摄像机。
help.securitycraft.claymore.info: 当敌对生物或玩家在阔剑地雷前5个方块区域内行走时，阔剑地雷会在一秒后爆炸。手持剪线钳同时右键单击阔剑地雷会解除地雷并让你可以破坏它。手持打火石同时右键单击阔剑地雷会重新启用地雷。
help.securitycraft.codebreaker.info: 手持密码破解器右键单击任何读取器，密码盘，密码保护箱/桶/熔炉等方块来破解它（只有5耐久并且每次使用只有1/3的几率破解）。
help.securitycraft.crystal_quartz.info: 水晶石英块可以用通常方式加固的建筑方块，其制作方式与原版石英块类似。
help.securitycraft.crystal_quartz_item.i: 水晶石英用于制作水晶石英块。
help.securitycraft.disguise_module.info: 伪装模块会将方块伪装为模块包含的方块。
help.securitycraft.display_cases.info: 展示柜可以展示一个物品，类似于原版的物品展示框，不过无法旋转。打开展示柜需要密码，就像密码盘和其他类似方块一样 。打开后，可以通过右键单将手持的物品放入展示柜。要取出物品，请潜行右键单击展示柜。要关闭展示柜，请空手右键单击它。箱子打开时，任何人都可以与它互动。发光版本在黑暗中可以发光，类似于原版的发光物品展示框。
help.securitycraft.electrified_iron_fenc: 通电铁栅栏的作用与普通栅栏相同，只是它牢不可破，并且会伤害任何除了所有者之外接触它的人。
help.securitycraft.furnace_mines.info: 熔炉地雷的功能与标准地雷一样，只不过它们在被所有者以外的人右键单击或破坏时会爆炸。
help.securitycraft.harming_module.info: 伤害模块为方块添加伤害属性。
help.securitycraft.ims.info: I.M.S.，或智能弹药系统，是一个可再装填的地雷，最多可容纳 4 个弹跳贝蒂，它将瞄准进入其射击半径的玩家和/或敌对生物。一旦地雷发射， 它会追踪该实体并爆炸。如果 I.M.S. 中缺少地雷，请右键单击它并使用更多弹跳贝蒂来补充。
help.securitycraft.inventory_scanner.inf: 物品栏扫描仪的使用方法是将两个扫描仪相距一格，面对面放置。正确放置时，它们之间应该出现一个激光场。放置完毕后，右键单击任一扫描仪并添加应检测的违禁物品。当玩家携带违禁物品在扫描仪之间行走时，将根据扫描仪中安装的模块执行不同的操作。
强化铁门的作用与原版铁门相同，只是它牢不可破。它只能通过密码盘、物品栏扫描仪等打开。强化铁门的所有者可以使用通用方块移除器将其拆除。
help.securitycraft.key_panel.info: 可以将密码盘面板放下来，形成更小的、可浸水的密码盘版本。密码盘面板用于合成密码盘、密码箱和密码炉等。
help.securitycraft.keycard_holder.info: 安全卡容器最多可容纳 5 张安全卡，手持安全卡容器右键单击来插入安全卡。当手持安全卡容器对读取器右键单击时，它会自动将每个安全卡一张一张地插入，直到一张安全卡成功打开读取器。
help.securitycraft.keycard_reader.info: 如果您插入与读取器设置匹配的安全卡，安全卡读取器会发出 15 格红石信号。您可以通过使用关联的安全卡以外的任何东西右键单击它来配置安全卡读取器。 签名是将读取器和安全卡关联在一起的数字。只有与所关联的读取器具有相同签名的安全卡才能打开该读取器。关联到其他玩家的读取器的安全卡将不适用于您的安全卡读取器。您可以拥有多个相同签名的安全卡读取器，并且具有该签名的所有安全卡也适用于它们。GUI右侧的安全卡等级按钮对于每个安全卡读取器都是单独的，并定义可用于激活此安全卡读取器的安全卡级别。
help.securitycraft.keycards.info: 安全卡可以关联到安全卡读卡器以便打开它们。要重置安全卡上的设置，请将其放入工作台中。有关更多信息，请参阅安全卡读取器的手册页面。
help.securitycraft.keypad.info: 密码盘的使用方法是放置密码盘后，右键单击它，然后设置数字密码。设置密码后，右键单击密码盘需要输入设置好的密码。如果正确，密码盘将发出红石信号三秒钟。
help.securitycraft.keypad_barrel.info: 密码保护桶配备了密码锁定系统。只要正确输入密码，桶就会打开。
密码保护高炉配备了密码锁定系统。只要正确输入密码，高炉就会打开。
help.securitycraft.keypad_chest.info: 密码保护箱配备了密码锁定系统。只要正确输入密码，箱子就会打开。
help.securitycraft.keypad_door.info: 密码门的作用类似于密码盘与强化铁门的结合，必须输入密码才能打开门。
help.securitycraft.keypad_frame.info: 密码盘框架用于制作密码盘。手持密码盘面板右键单击可使其变为密码盘
help.securitycraft.keypad_furnace.info: 密码保护熔炉配备了密码锁定系统。只要正确输入密码，熔炉就会打开。
help.securitycraft.keypad_smoker.info: 密码保护烟熏炉配备了密码锁定系统。只要正确输入密码，烟熏炉就会打开。
help.securitycraft.keypad_trapdoor.info: 密码活板门的作用类似于密码盘与强化活板门的结合，必须输入密码才能打开活板门。
help.securitycraft.laser_block.info: 若要使用激光方块，则需要在五个方块的距离之内放置两个相对的激光方块。正确放置后，它们之间会产生激光。玩家走过激光时，两个方块都会发出 15 格的红石信号。
help.securitycraft.limited_use_keycard.i: 使用限制安全卡可以和1-5级安全卡合成，使后者变为有使用次数限制的安全卡。可以在安全卡读卡器上写入安全卡的使用次数限制。
help.securitycraft.mine.info: 当苦力怕、猫和豹猫以外的任何实体踩到地雷时，地雷就会爆炸。手持剪线钳的同时右键单击地雷将拆除地雷并让您可以打破它。手持打火石的同时右键单击地雷将重新启用它。
help.securitycraft.motion_activated_ligh: 当玩家处于运动感应灯的一定范围内（可配置）时，运动感应灯会发出类似于红石灯的光。
help.securitycraft.panic_button.info: 紧急按钮看起来像一个按钮，但工作原理与拉杆相同。
help.securitycraft.portable_radar.info: 每当玩家处于雷达检测半径内时，便携式雷达就会向所有者发送聊天消息（可在配置文件中修改）。
便携式曲调播放器可以播放之前保存的曲调。要保存曲调，请右键单击已录制曲调的声波安全系统。要播放曲调，请右键单击便携式曲调播放器。要取消播放，只需再次右键单击便携式曲调播放器即可。
help.securitycraft.projector.info: 投影仪可以将您选择的方块的全息版本投射到世界中，这可以用来隐藏建筑物或其他区域。投影的范围和宽度可以在投影仪的 GUI 中更改。
help.securitycraft.protecto.info: 防火墙，灵感来自于卡普空游戏《洛克人：网络战斗2》中的敌人，会利用间隔10秒的闪电攻击10格范围内任意生物。需要露天，且处于下雨情况下才能触发。
help.securitycraft.redstone_module.info: 红石模块会为方块添加能量属性。
help.securitycraft.reinforced.info: 强化方块是牢不可破的方块。只有放下它们的人才能使用通用方块移除器破坏它们。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_buttons.in: 强化按钮只能由其所有者或白名单上的玩家激活。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_crystal_qu: 强化水晶石英块用于构建方块领域。更多信息请参见方块领域管理器页面。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_fence_gate: 通电铁栅栏门的作用与原版栅栏门相同，只是它牢不可破。它只能通过密码盘、物品栏扫描仪等打开。并且会伤害任何除了所有者之外接触它的人。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_glass_pane: 强化玻璃板与普通玻璃板相同。只有放下它们的人才能使用通用方块移除器破坏它们。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_hopper.inf: 如果玩家拥有密码保护箱或桶，则强化漏斗是唯一可用于从密码保护的箱或桶中提取物品的方块。否则它会像原版漏斗一样。
强化铁栏杆与原版铁栏杆相同，只有放下它们的人才能使用通用方块移除器破坏它们。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_iron_trapd: 强化铁活板门与原版活板门相同,只是它牢不可破。它只能通过密码盘、物品栏扫描仪等打开。只有放下它们的人才能使用通用方块移除器破坏它们。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_lever.info: 强化拉杆只能由其所有者或白名单上的玩家激活。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_pressure_p: 强化压力板只能由其所有者或白名单上的玩家激活。
help.securitycraft.remote_access_mine.in: 地雷远程访问工具将允许您远程访问地雷。右键单击地雷将其绑定到该工具。手持地雷远程访问工具右键单击空气以打开该工具的 GUI，这将允许您安装保险销、拆除保险销、立刻引爆或解除任何绑定的地雷。
哨兵远程访问工具将允许您远程访问哨兵。右键单击哨兵将其绑定到该工具。手持哨兵远程访问工具空中右键单击空气打开该工具的 GUI，这将允许您更改每个绑定哨兵或同时更改所有绑定哨兵的模式。
help.securitycraft.retinal_scanner.info: 当放置者用十字准心对着虹膜扫描仪时，虹膜扫描仪会发出 15 格红石信号。
help.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.info: 裂缝稳定器检测并阻止其附近实体的传送尝试（默认情况下为 5 格范围，可以使用通用方块修改器进行更改）。如果传送的源或目标位置在裂缝稳定器的范围内，则传送尝试将被禁止。右键单击该方块将允许您查看所有可检测的传送类型的列表。
help.securitycraft.sc_manual.info: 安全工艺手册显示了有关安全工艺添加的所有方块和物品的基本信息。如需更深入的了解，请查看 FTB wiki：https://ftb.gamepedia.com/SecurityCraft。
help.securitycraft.scanner_door.info: 扫描门的作用就像虹膜扫描仪与强化铁门的结合，所有者只需看着扫描们即可打开或关闭它。
help.securitycraft.secret_signs.info: 秘密告示牌的工作方式与原版告示牌类似，略有不同的是，只有告示牌的所有者和白名单上的玩家才能与其交互并查看其上的文本。确保没有人可以破坏它附着的方块！
help.securitycraft.security_camera.info: 安防摄像头允许您从其位置查看附近区域。只需放下安防摄像头，然后用摄像头监视器右键单击它即可将其绑定以供使用。
help.securitycraft.sentry.info: 哨兵用无限的子弹攻击入侵者。或者，也可以将其他子弹放入哨兵下方的密码保护箱或桶中来使用。它具有三种模式和三种目标类型。模式有“空闲”（它永远不会攻击）、“伪装”（只有当目标在范围内时才会激活）和“攻击”（始终处于激活状态），后两种模式有三种目标类型“仅敌对生物”、“敌对生物和玩家”和“仅玩家”。伪装模块将使哨兵伪装成与模块中插入的方块一样，速度模块将提高哨兵的攻击速度，白名单模块将禁止其射击保护的玩家。可以通过右键单击哨兵来插入或切换模块，并且可以通过使用通用方块修改器提取模块。要移除哨兵，请潜行右键单击它。
help.securitycraft.smart_module.info: 智能模块升级了方块的范围或功能。
help.securitycraft.sonic_security_system: 声波安全系统的灵感来自游戏《银河战士Prime2：黑暗回音》中同名的设备，它能够锁定某些安全工艺的方块，并阻止它们被使用或交互。手持声波安全系统右键单击支持的方块会将其绑定到声波安全系统。放下后，右键单击它将打开一个 GUI，您可以在其中启用、禁用或重置声波安全系统。可以通过便携式曲调播放器或音符盒播放设定的曲调来解锁绑定的方块。要设定曲调，请在 Sonic Security System 的 GUI 中打开音符录制，然后使用附近播放的音符块播放您想要的曲调。 完成后关闭录音。 每当该曲调在声波安全系统附近播放时，被其锁定的块就会在短时间内变得可访问。
help.securitycraft.speed_module.info: 速度模块允许安全工艺的某些方块比平常更快地运行。
help.securitycraft.storage_module.info: 存储模块添加或升级方块库存的大小。
help.securitycraft.taser.info: 泰瑟枪是一种自动充电电击枪。右键单击即可启动它。被泰瑟枪击中的实体将获得反胃 II、迟缓 II 和虚弱 II 的状态，持续 10 秒。 如果手持泰瑟枪潜行右键单击（物品栏中有红石），在下一次射击时将其强度加倍。
help.securitycraft.track_mine.info: 当矿车经过铁轨地雷顶部时，铁轨地雷就会爆炸。
help.securitycraft.trophy_system.info: 该战利系统的灵感来自于动视的《使命召唤：现代战争3》中首次出现的小工具，它会瞄准敌人的箭和火焰弹，并在半秒的充电时间后射出镭射光将其摧毁。
help.securitycraft.universal_block_modif: 通用方块修改器用于自定义安全工艺添加的各种方块。右键单击一个方块以打开自定义 GUI。 然后您可以插入模块来自定义该块的功能。
help.securitycraft.universal_block_remov: 通用方块移除器用于通过右键单击强化方块来摧毁它。只有放下方块的人才能摧毁它。
help.securitycraft.universal_key_changer: 通用密钥变换器允许您更改您拥有的密码保护方块的密码。右键单击密码保护方块以打开 GUI，然后输入所需的新密码。
help.securitycraft.universal_owner_chang: 通用所属玩家转换器可以更改块的所有者。要更改所有者，请将铁砧中将该物品重命名为新所有者的名称。然后只需右键单击原所有者的方块，它就会发生变化。如果在配置中启用，则可以通过右键单击未命名的通用所属玩家转换器来声明一个没有所有者的方块。
help.securitycraft.username_logger.info: 当收到红石信号时，用户名记录器将记录 3 格方块内所有玩家的姓名。
help.securitycraft.whitelist_module.info: 白名单模块通常用于将特定玩家移除方块效果或者密码检查。
help.securitycraft.wire_cutters.info: 用剪线钳右键单击地雷即可将其拆除。
messages.securitycraft:adminTool.disable: 管理员工具已通过配置文件禁用。
messages.securitycraft:adminTool.needCre: 您需要处于创造模式才能使用管理员工具。
messages.securitycraft:adminTool.noInfo: 这个方块没有信息可显示！
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.alrea: 方块领域已经组装完毕！
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.assem: 组装方块领域失败 %1$s 方块领域管理器. (错误方块: %2$s)
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.block: "%2$s" 阻塞了空间： %1$s 方块领域管理器!
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.inval: 无效方块 "%2$s" %1$s 方块领域管理器! (预期方块: "%3$s")
支柱 %1$s 旋转方向不正确!
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.multi: 该结构中有多个方块领域管理器。
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.notEn: 您没有足够的物品来组装这种尺寸的方块领域！
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.unown: 你没有方块领域管理器中这些方块的权限： "%2$s" %1$s
messages.securitycraft:bugReport: 请在我们的 Discord 服务器上的 #bugreport 频道中报告错误。 请先阅读规则
messages.securitycraft:cameraMonitor.bou: 已绑定 %s 处的摄像头进行监控。
messages.securitycraft:cameraMonitor.cam: 位置 %s 的摄像头不可用。它可能在不同的维度中未加载，或者已不存在。
messages.securitycraft:cameraMonitor.can: 您无法查看不属于您的相机。
messages.securitycraft:cameraMonitor.rig: 右键单击安防摄像头即可查看它。
messages.securitycraft:cameraMonitor.unb: 将 %s 处的摄像机与监视器解除绑定。
messages.securitycraft:codebreaker.faile: 密码破解尝试失败，请重试。
messages.securitycraft:codebreakerDisabl: 密码破解器已通过配置文件禁用。
messages.securitycraft:command.sc.usage: 用法: /sc connect 或者 /sc disconnect 或者 /sc contact 或者 /sc resume
messages.securitycraft:dump.notFound: 安全工艺没有向 "%s" 注册。
messages.securitycraft:dump.result: 单击此处将 %s 注册表项复制到剪贴板。
messages.securitycraft:frame.rightclick: 由于LookingGlass尚未移植到1.7.10以上的任何版本，因此目前无法在框架中查看摄像头监视器。在未来的更新中，该功能可能会在不依赖任何库模块（如LookingGlass）的情况下回归，但具体时间未知。
messages.securitycraft:invScan.notConnec: 没有连接到另一个物品栏扫描仪！
messages.securitycraft:irc.connected: 从 安全工艺 v1.8.3 开始，不再支持 IRC 聊天。 如果您需要帮助，请参阅 安全工艺 的 Discord 上的 #help 频道！
messages.securitycraft:keycardReader.dif: 这张卡关联的安全卡读取器的所属玩家和正在试图使用它的玩家不是同一人！
messages.securitycraft:keycardReader.noU: 这张安全卡没有任何用处了！
messages.securitycraft:keycardReader.wro: 此安全卡读取器不允许使用 %s 级的安全卡！
此卡上保存的签名与安全卡读取器的签名不匹配！
messages.securitycraft:keycard_holder.fa: 该安全卡容器中没有能匹配的安全卡。
messages.securitycraft:keycard_holder.no: 该安全卡容器没有任何关联的安全卡。
messages.securitycraft:laser.sync_failed: 与 %s 处的激光块同步失败，因为“%s”不匹配。从任一方块中删除模块并重试。
messages.securitycraft:module.alreadyCon: 您持有的模块已经包含玩家#。
messages.securitycraft:module.notHolding: 您必须持有要保存数据的模块。
您必须持有要修改的模块！
messages.securitycraft:module.onAllowlis: 您已被添加到白名单中。
messages.securitycraft:module.onDenylist: 您已被添加到黑名单中。
messages.securitycraft:module.removed: 从保留的模块中删除了#。
messages.securitycraft:mrat.bound: 将 %s 处的地雷绑定到远程访问工具。
messages.securitycraft:mrat.cantBind: 你不能绑定不属于你的地雷。
messages.securitycraft:mrat.noSlots: 没有更多的空槽位可以绑定这个地雷了！
messages.securitycraft:mrat.unbound: 通过远程访问工具解除 %s 处地雷的绑定。
messages.securitycraft:notOwned: 抱歉，您不能对此块执行此操作。 它的所有者是 %s。
messages.securitycraft:ownable.ownerNotV: 该方块的所有者已被通用所属玩家转换器更改，因此需要新所有者验证才能再次工作。要验证该方块，方块的新所有者必须右键单击它。
messages.securitycraft:ownable.validate: 该方块的所有者已成功验证。
messages.securitycraft:passcodeProtected: 该方块还没有密码。你无法与它互动。
messages.securitycraft:portableRadar.wit: %1$s 位于您名为 %2$s 的便携式雷达附近。
%1$s 位于 %2$s 附近，正靠近您的便携式雷达。
messages.securitycraft:reinforcedSlab.ca: 您必须是该方块的所有者才能将其变成双层台阶。
messages.securitycraft:retinalScanner.no: 抱歉，您无法使用此扫描仪。 它的所有者是 %s。
messages.securitycraft:rift_stabilizer.n: 你不能从这个位置传送！
你不能传送到那个位置！
messages.securitycraft:sentry.descriptio: （始终激活，攻击敌对生物和玩家）
（当敌对生物或玩家靠近时激活，攻击敌对生物和玩家）
（当敌对生物靠近时激活，攻击敌对生物）
（当玩家靠近时激活，攻击玩家）
messages.securitycraft:sentry.needsBlock: 您必须将哨兵放置在方块顶部！
messages.securitycraft:sonic_security_sy: 取消与 %2$s 的 %1$s 的链接。
您无法链接到其他块。 每个声波安全系统最多可以链接到 %s 个方块。
此 %s 已被声波安全系统锁定！
尚未与方块链接。请先手持该物品右键单击一个兼容的安全工艺方块
messages.securitycraft:srat.bound: 将 %s 处的哨兵绑定到远程访问工具。
messages.securitycraft:srat.cantBind: 你不能绑定不属于你的哨兵。
messages.securitycraft:srat.noSlots: 没有更多的空槽位可以绑定此哨兵！
messages.securitycraft:srat.unbound: 从远程访问工具解除 %s 处哨兵的绑定。
messages.securitycraft:tip.discord: 对模组有建议或发现错误吗？ 加入我们的 Discord 服务器（仅英文）！ 您还将收到有关安全工艺的重要更新和公告。
messages.securitycraft:tip.outdated: 您的安全工艺版本已过时！ 考虑更新以拥有更多功能和更少bug。
messages.securitycraft:tip.patreon: 如果您喜欢安全工艺，请考虑在 Patreon 上支持我们！ 您可以与我们合作，将您想要的功能添加到模组中。
messages.securitycraft:tip.scHelp: 输入 /sc help 将为您提供安全工艺手册的配方，该手册将展示安全工艺的方块/物品的帮助信息。
messages.securitycraft:tip.scserver: 安全工艺官方服务器回来了！ 使用此 IP 加入：securitycraft.nodecraft.gg
messages.securitycraft:universalKeyChang: 该公文包没有密码，无法重置。
这不是您的公文包，您无法更改其密码。
该公文包的密码已重置。
手持通用密钥变换器右键单击密码盘以更改其密码。
messages.securitycraft:universalOwnerCha: 这不是您的公文包，您无法更改其所有者。
该方块不能拥有所有者。 请右键单击合适的安全工艺方块。
您无法在没有所有者的情况下声明方块。
您需要为该项目指定新所有者的名称。使用铁砧重命名它。
这不是您的方块，您无法更改其所有者。
该方块的所有者已更改，需要经过新所有者的验证才能再次工作。 要验证方块，新所有者必须右键单击它。
Adding a smart module to an alarm will allow you to select which sound the alarm plays when it is activated.
module.securitycraft.block_change_detect: Adding a disguise module to a block change detector will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
Adding a redstone module to a block change detector makes it emit a redstone signal each time it detects a block was changed by a player in its vicinity.
Adding a smart module to a block change detector allows it to only log changes of one specific type of block. The block can be set in the GUI.

Adding an allowlist module to a block change detector will allow listed players to place/break blocks in the block's vicinity, without getting logged. They will also be able to view all logged entries, however they cannot clear them, or change the block's settings.
module.securitycraft.block_pocket_manage: Adding a disguise module to a Block Pocket Manager will make the Block Pocket's sides opaque.

Adding a storage module to a Block Pocket Manager will add an inventory to it, allowing you to store the blocks you need for building the Block Pocket. This also allows you to auto-assemble the Block Pocket if all necessary building materials are present.
Adding an allowlist module to a Block Pocket Manager will allow listed players to pass through the Block Pocket's sides.
module.securitycraft.cage_trap.disguise_: Adding a disguise module to a cage trap will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.cage_trap.whitelist: Adding an allowlist module to a Cage Trap will prevent listed players from being trapped.
module.securitycraft.display_case.blackl: Adding a denylist module to a display case will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft.display_case.harmin: Adding a harming module to a block that requires a passcode will result in the player getting damaged, if they enter an incorrect code.
module.securitycraft.display_case.smart_: Adding a smart module to a block that requires a passcode will result in a cooldown being applied after an incorrect code has been entered. During that time, no new code can be entered.
module.securitycraft.display_case.whitel: Adding an allowlist module to a display case will allow listed players to open it without knowing the code.
module.securitycraft.glow_display_case.b: Adding a denylist module to a display case will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft.glow_display_case.h: Adding a harming module to a block that requires a passcode will result in the player getting damaged, if they enter an incorrect code.
module.securitycraft.glow_display_case.s: Adding a smart module to a block that requires a passcode will result in a cooldown being applied after an incorrect code has been entered. During that time, no new code can be entered.
module.securitycraft.glow_display_case.w: Adding an allowlist module to a display case will allow listed players to open it without knowing the code.
module.securitycraft.ims.speed_module.de: Adding a speed module to an I.M.S. will make the I.M.S. shoot faster, as well as increase the speed of the shot bombs.
module.securitycraft.ims.whitelist_modul: Adding an allowlist module to an I.M.S. will allow listed players to walk into the range of the I.M.S. without being targeted.
module.securitycraft.inventory_scanner.d: Adding a disguise module to an inventory scanner will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.inventory_scanner.r: Adding a redstone module to an inventory scanner will cause it to emit a redstone signal whenever a listed item is found when something passes through its field.
module.securitycraft.inventory_scanner.s: Adding a smart module to an inventory scanner will make the scanner check for enchantments and other metadata changes when scanning inventories.
Adding a storage module will allow the scanner to store the items it finds while something passes through the field in a built-in inventory.
module.securitycraft.inventory_scanner.w: Adding an allowlist module to an inventory scanner will allow listed players to walk through the scanning field without checking their inventory.
module.securitycraft.key_panel.blacklist: Adding a denylist module to a key panel will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft.key_panel.harming_m: Adding a harming module to a block that requires a passcode will result in the player getting damaged, if they enter an incorrect code.
module.securitycraft.key_panel.smart_mod: Adding a smart module to a block that requires a passcode will result in a cooldown being applied after an incorrect code has been entered. During that time, no new code can be entered.
module.securitycraft.key_panel.whitelist: Adding an allowlist module to a key panel will allow listed players to use the block without knowing the code.
module.securitycraft.keycard_reader.blac: Adding a denylist module to a keycard reader will ban listed players from interacting with the reader.
module.securitycraft.keycard_reader.disg: Adding a disguise module to a keycard reader will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.keycard_reader.smar: Adding a smart module to a keycard reader will allow for unrestricted control of the keycard levels accepted by the keycard reader.
module.securitycraft.keycard_reader.whit: Adding an allowlist module to a keycard reader will allow listed players to link their own keycards to the reader and view its settings.
module.securitycraft.keypad.blacklist_mo: Adding a denylist module to a keypad will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft.keypad.disguise_mod: Adding a disguise module to a keypad will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.keypad.harming_modu: Adding a harming module to a block that requires a passcode will result in the player getting damaged, if they enter an incorrect code.
module.securitycraft.keypad.smart_module: Adding a smart module to a block that requires a passcode will result in a cooldown being applied after an incorrect code has been entered. During that time, no new code can be entered.
module.securitycraft.keypad.whitelist_mo: Adding an allowlist module to a keypad will allow listed players to use the block without knowing the code.
module.securitycraft.keypad_barrel.black: Adding a denylist module to a Passcode-protected Barrel will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft.keypad_barrel.disgu: Adding a disguise module to a Passcode-protected Barrel will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.keypad_barrel.harmi: Adding a harming module to a block that requires a passcode will result in the player getting damaged, if they enter an incorrect code.
module.securitycraft.keypad_barrel.smart: Adding a smart module to a block that requires a passcode will result in a cooldown being applied after an incorrect code has been entered. During that time, no new code can be entered.
module.securitycraft.keypad_barrel.white: Adding an allowlist module to a Passcode-protected Barrel will allow players to open it without knowing the code. Additionally, Reinforced Hoppers owned by listed players can extract items from the barrel.
module.securitycraft.keypad_blast_furnac: Adding a denylist module to a Passcode-protected Blast Furnace will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
Adding a disguise module to a Passcode-protected Blast Furnace will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
Adding a harming module to a block that requires a passcode will result in the player getting damaged, if they enter an incorrect code.
Adding a smart module to a block that requires a passcode will result in a cooldown being applied after an incorrect code has been entered. During that time, no new code can be entered.

Adding an allowlist module to a Passcode-protected Blast Furnace will allow players to open it without knowing the code. Additionally, Reinforced Hoppers owned by listed players can extract items from the blast furnace.
module.securitycraft.keypad_chest.blackl: Adding a denylist module to a Passcode-protected Chest will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft.keypad_chest.harmin: Adding a harming module to a block that requires a passcode will result in the player getting damaged, if they enter an incorrect code.
module.securitycraft.keypad_chest.redsto: Adding a redstone module to a Passcode-protected Chest will make the chest output a redstone signal while being open, with a strength depending on how many players are simultaneously looking into the chest.
module.securitycraft.keypad_chest.smart_: Adding a smart module to a block that requires a passcode will result in a cooldown being applied after an incorrect code has been entered. During that time, no new code can be entered.
module.securitycraft.keypad_chest.whitel: Adding an allowlist module to a Passcode-protected Chest will allow players to open it without knowing the code. Additionally, Reinforced Hoppers owned by listed players can extract items from the chest.
module.securitycraft.keypad_door.blackli: Adding a denylist module to a keypad door will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft.keypad_door.harming: Adding a harming module to a block that requires a passcode will result in the player getting damaged, if they enter an incorrect code.
module.securitycraft.keypad_door.smart_m: Adding a smart module to a block that requires a passcode will result in a cooldown being applied after an incorrect code has been entered. During that time, no new code can be entered.
module.securitycraft.keypad_door.whiteli: Adding an allowlist module to a keypad door will allow listed players to use the block without knowing the code.
module.securitycraft.keypad_furnace.blac: Adding a denylist module to a Passcode-protected Furnace will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft.keypad_furnace.disg: Adding a disguise module to a Passcode-protected Furnace will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.keypad_furnace.harm: Adding a harming module to a block that requires a passcode will result in the player getting damaged, if they enter an incorrect code.
module.securitycraft.keypad_furnace.smar: Adding a smart module to a block that requires a passcode will result in a cooldown being applied after an incorrect code has been entered. During that time, no new code can be entered.
module.securitycraft.keypad_furnace.whit: Adding an allowlist module to a Passcode-protected Furnace will allow players to open it without knowing the code. Additionally, Reinforced Hoppers owned by listed players can extract items from the furnace.
module.securitycraft.keypad_smoker.black: Adding a denylist module to a Passcode-protected Smoker will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft.keypad_smoker.disgu: Adding a disguise module to a Passcode-protected Smoker will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.keypad_smoker.harmi: Adding a harming module to a block that requires a passcode will result in the player getting damaged, if they enter an incorrect code.
module.securitycraft.keypad_smoker.smart: Adding a smart module to a block that requires a passcode will result in a cooldown being applied after an incorrect code has been entered. During that time, no new code can be entered.
module.securitycraft.keypad_smoker.white: Adding an allowlist module to a Passcode-protected Smoker will allow players to open it without knowing the code. Additionally, Reinforced Hoppers owned by listed players can extract items from the smoker.
module.securitycraft.keypad_trapdoor.bla: Adding a denylist module to a keypad trapdoor will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft.keypad_trapdoor.har: Adding a harming module to a block that requires a passcode will result in the player getting damaged, if they enter an incorrect code.
module.securitycraft.keypad_trapdoor.sma: Adding a smart module to a block that requires a passcode will result in a cooldown being applied after an incorrect code has been entered. During that time, no new code can be entered.
module.securitycraft.keypad_trapdoor.whi: Adding an allowlist module to a keypad trapdoor will allow listed players to use the block without knowing the code.
module.securitycraft.laser_block.disguis: Adding a disguise module to a laser block will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.laser_block.harming: Adding a harming module to a laser block will cause players to take damage if they step through the lasers.
module.securitycraft.laser_block.redston: Adding a redstone module to a laser block will cause it to emit a 15-block redstone signal when a mob or player walks through the laser.
module.securitycraft.laser_block.smart_m: Adding a smart module to a laser block will allow to turn off the laser for specific sides of the block.
module.securitycraft.laser_block.whiteli: Adding an allowlist module to a laser block will allow listed players to walk through the lasers without emitting a redstone signal.
module.securitycraft.portable_radar.reds: Adding a redstone module to a portable radar will cause the radar to emit a redstone signal whenever a player is within range.
module.securitycraft.portable_radar.whit: Adding an allowlist module to a portable radar will remove listed players from the radar's search.
module.securitycraft.projector.disguise_: Adding a disguise module to a Projector will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.projector.redstone_: Adding a redstone module to a Projector will allow you to manually toggle the Projector on and off using redstone power.
module.securitycraft.protecto.disguise_m: Adding a disguise module to a protecto will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.protecto.speed_modu: Adding a speed module to a protecto will allow it to attack twice as fast.
module.securitycraft.protecto.whitelist_: Adding an allowlist module to a protecto will allow listed players to walk into the range of the protecto without being targeted.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_acacia_b: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Acacia Button will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_acacia_p: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Acacia Pressure Plate will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_birch_bu: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Birch Button will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_birch_pr: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Birch Pressure Plate will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_cauldron: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Cauldron will allow listed players to interact with the Reinforced Cauldron.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_crimson_: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Crimson Button will allow listed players to activate it.
Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Crimson Pressure Plate will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_dark_oak: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Dark Oak Button will allow listed players to activate it.
Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Dark Oak Pressure Plate will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_hopper.w: Adding an allowlist module to a reinforced hopper will allow listed players to access the hopper's contents.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_jungle_b: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Jungle Button will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_jungle_p: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Jungle Pressure Plate will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_lava_cau: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Cauldron will allow listed players to interact with the Reinforced Cauldron.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_lever.wh: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Lever will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_oak_butt: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Oak Button will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_oak_pres: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Oak Pressure Plate will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_polished: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Polished Blackstone Button will allow listed players to activate it.
Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Polished Blackstone Pressure Plate will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_powder_s: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Cauldron will allow listed players to interact with the Reinforced Cauldron.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_spruce_b: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Spruce Button will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_spruce_p: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Spruce Pressure Plate will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_stone_bu: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Stone Button will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_stone_pr: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Stone Pressure Plate will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_warped_b: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Warped Button will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_warped_p: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Warped Pressure Plate will allow listed players to activate it.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_water_ca: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Cauldron will allow listed players to interact with the Reinforced Cauldron.
module.securitycraft.retinal_scanner.dis: Adding a disguise module to a retinal scanner will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.retinal_scanner.whi: Adding the allowlist module to a retinal scanner will allow listed players to use the scanner even if they aren't the player who placed down the block.
module.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.dis: Adding a disguise module to a Rift Stabilizer will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.har: Adding a harming module to a Rift Stabilizer will cause players attempting to teleport into or from its vicinity to take damage.
module.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.red: Adding a redstone module to a Rift Stabilizer makes it emit a redstone signal each time it detects a teleportation attempt in its vicinity. This redstone signal will be stronger if the detection happened near the block, and weaker if it happened further away. Additionally, it will allow a comparator to be used to determine the last detected teleportation type.
module.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.sma: Adding a smart module to a Rift Stabilizer will allow you to configure which teleportation types the Rift Stabilizer is able to detect.
module.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.whi: Adding an allowlist module to a Rift Stabilizer will allow listed players to teleport into or from the block's vicinity.
module.securitycraft.scanner_door.whitel: Adding an allowlist module to a scanner door will allow players to use the scanner door even if they aren't the player who placed down the block.
Adding an allowlist module to a Secret Sign will allow listed players to interact with, and view the text on it.
module.securitycraft.secret_birch_sign.w: Adding an allowlist module to a Secret Sign will allow listed players to interact with, and view the text on it.
module.securitycraft.secret_crimson_sign: Adding an allowlist module to a Secret Sign will allow listed players to interact with, and view the text on it.
module.securitycraft.secret_dark_oak_sig: Adding an allowlist module to a Secret Sign will allow listed players to interact with, and view the text on it.
Adding an allowlist module to a Secret Sign will allow listed players to interact with, and view the text on it.
module.securitycraft.secret_sign.whiteli: Adding an allowlist module to a Secret Sign will allow listed players to interact with, and view the text on it.
Adding an allowlist module to a Secret Sign will allow listed players to interact with, and view the text on it.
Adding an allowlist module to a Secret Sign will allow listed players to interact with, and view the text on it.
module.securitycraft.security_camera.red: Adding the redstone module to a camera lets the camera emit a 15-block redstone signal when enabled.
module.securitycraft.security_camera.whi: Adding the allowlist module to a camera will allow listed players to access the camera.
module.securitycraft.sonic_security_syst: Adding a redstone module to a sonic security system lets the system emit a redstone signal when the correct tune was played.
Adding an allowlist module to a sonic security system will allow listed players to save the system's tune onto a portable tune player, as well as listen to the tune in the system's GUI.
module.securitycraft.trophy_system.disgu: Adding a disguise module to a Trophy System will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.trophy_system.smart: Adding a smart module to a Trophy System will allow you to configure which projectile types the Trophy System is allowed to target.
module.securitycraft.trophy_system.speed: Adding a speed module to a Trophy System allows it to destroy targets twice as fast.
module.securitycraft.trophy_system.white: Adding an allowlist module to a Trophy System will make it ignore projectiles thrown by listed players, as well as their Sentries' bullets and I.M.S.' bombs.
module.securitycraft.username_logger.dis: Adding a disguise module to a username logger will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.username_logger.whi: Adding an allowlist module to a Username Logger will prevent the listed players from being logged.
option.generic.disabled.description: Should this block be disabled, making it no longer work until it is enabled again?
option.generic.ignoreOwner.description: Should this block ignore its owner, meaning any functionality it has will not work for the owner?
option.generic.smartModuleCooldown.descr: How long can players not enter a passcode after an incorrect code has been entered? (In Ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second; requires Smart Module)
option.generic.viewActivated.maximumDist: From at most how many blocks away is it possible to activate this block?
option.securitycraft.alarm.range.descrip: How many blocks away can the alarm sound be heard?
option.securitycraft.alarm.resetCooldown: Should the cooldown between alarm sounds be reset when the alarm is powered on, meaning the sound is always played immediately?
option.securitycraft.block_change_detect: How far away should the detector be able to detect block changes by players?
How long should the redstone signal after detecting a block change be? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second)
option.securitycraft.cage_trap.captureMo: Should this cage trap capture hostile mobs and players, or only players?
option.securitycraft.claymore.range.desc: From how many blocks can the claymore be tripped from?
option.securitycraft.display_case.sendMe: Does this case send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft.glow_display_case.s: Does this case send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft.ims.range.descripti: How many blocks away can the I.M.S. detect potential targets from?
option.securitycraft.inventory_scanner.h: Should the inventory scanner fields created by this scanner be horizontal?
option.securitycraft.inventory_scanner.s: Should the inventory scanner's fields solidify when a prohibited item is detected?
option.securitycraft.key_panel.isAlwaysA: Should the key panel remain active and unlocked?
option.securitycraft.key_panel.sendMessa: Does this key panel send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft.key_panel.signalLen: How long should the redstone signal upon successful activation be? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second)
option.securitycraft.keycard_reader.send: Does this keycard reader send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft.keycard_reader.sign: How long should the redstone signal upon successful activation be? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second)
option.securitycraft.keypad.isAlwaysActi: Should the keypad remain active and unlocked?
Does this keypad send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft.keypad.signalLength: How long should the redstone signal upon successful activation be? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second)
option.securitycraft.keypad_barrel.sendM: Does this barrel send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft.keypad_blast_furnac: Does this blast furnace send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft.keypad_chest.sendMe: Does this chest send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft.keypad_door.sendMes: Does this keypad door send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft.keypad_door.signalL: How long should the door stay open? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second. Set to 0 to have the door stay open)
option.securitycraft.keypad_furnace.send: Does this furnace send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft.keypad_smoker.sendM: Does this smoker send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft.keypad_trapdoor.sen: Does this keypad trapdoor send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft.keypad_trapdoor.sig: How long should the trapdoor stay open? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second. Set to 0 to have the trapdoor stay open)
option.securitycraft.motion_activated_li: How far will the light detect an entity?
option.securitycraft.portable_radar.repe: Should the radar repeat the message as long as someone is in its radius?
option.securitycraft.portable_radar.sear: The rate at which the radar searches at.
The radius the radar searches in.
option.securitycraft.reinforced_cauldron: Should every player be able to interact with this block?
option.securitycraft.reinforced_lava_cau: Should every player be able to interact with this block?
option.securitycraft.reinforced_powder_s: Should every player be able to interact with this block?
option.securitycraft.reinforced_water_ca: Should every player be able to interact with this block?
option.securitycraft.retinal_scanner.act: Can this scanner be activated by NPC mobs that look at it?
option.securitycraft.retinal_scanner.sen: Does this scanner send a message upon activation?
option.securitycraft.retinal_scanner.sig: How long should the redstone signal upon successful activation be? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second)
option.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.ran: How far away should the Rift Stabilizer be able to prevent teleportation attempts?
option.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.sig: How long should the redstone signal after detecting a teleportation attempt be? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second)
option.securitycraft.scanner_door.sendMe: Does this scanner door send a message upon activation?
option.securitycraft.scanner_door.signal: How long should the door stay open? (In Ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second. Set to 0 to have the door stay open)
option.securitycraft.secret_birch_sign.i: Should the text of the secret sign only be visible to the owner and players on the allowlist?

option.securitycraft.security_camera.rot: The speed at which the camera rotates.
option.securitycraft.sonic_security_syst: How long should the sonic security system unlock blocks/give off a redstone signal after hearing the correct tune? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second)
option.securitycraft.username_logger.sea: The range in blocks in which the username logger searches for players.
tooltip.securitycraft:keycard.limited_in: 将此卡与使用限制安全卡组合，以控制其使用次数。
tooltip.securitycraft:keycard.link_info: 将此卡放入安全卡读取器中以关联它。
tooltip.securitycraft:keycard.reader_own: 适用于拥有的安全读取器: %s
tooltip.securitycraft:projector: 将全息方块投影到世界中。
